subject: Baseball
Kidnapping
lead_paragraph: Nationals catcher Wilson Ramos is among the thousands of people abducted in Venezuela, where an estimated 17,000 kidnappings took place from July 2008 to July 2009.
snippet: Nationals catcher Wilson Ramos is among the thousands of people abducted in Venezuela, where an estimated 17,000 kidnappings took place from July 2008 to July 2009.
